name: Bothawui Operative
Lore: 'Gran pacifists responsible for maintaining contact with the Bothans. Some are stationed on the Bothan homeworld to help monitor sensitive information.',
Text: 'While at a Bothawui site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is forfeit +1 (and power +1 if your Bothan is on Bothawui) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to ABothawui from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
